text.section: Except for a bank, trust company, savings bank, or savings and loan association that is authorized to do business in this State, a person may not use any name, title, or other words that represent that the person is authorized to do the business of banking in this State.

section.section: In this subsection the following terms have the meanings indicated.
"Name" means the name, trade name, trademark, service mark, logo, or tagline used by a bank to identify itself.

text.section:
In addition to any other remedies a bank may have under any other provision of law, a bank that is affected by a violation of subsection (b) of this section may bring an action against the person that committed the violation to recover:
Actual damages sustained as a result of the violation;
Either:
All profits attributable to the violation; or
$1,000 for each violation; and
Court costs and reasonable attorney's fees.
Any person who violates subsection (a) of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $3,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 5 years or both.
